ai-patthana14.26:0.2_0: (The teachings should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana14.26:1.1_0: Understanding should be given up by seeing.
ai-patthana14.26:1.1_1: Understanding should be given up by seeing.
ai-patthana14.26:1.1_2: Seeing this, you should give up dangerous seeing. You should not give up any things that should be given up.
ai-patthana14.26:2.1_0: Not seeing should be given up, relying on not give up.
ai-patthana14.26:3.1_0: Without seeing should be given up by seeing, and by relying on give up.
ai-patthana14.26:4.1_0: for the sake of letting go, two results, together with the five results of deeds ...
